sentences.en: Adriamycin can selectively kill perikaryon by way of retrograde axoplasmic transport.
sentences.cn: 阿霉素(多柔比星)可以通过逆向轴浆运输选择性杀死神经元胞体.

sentences.en: He has retrograde amnesia, acute psychological suppression.
sentences.cn: -他得了逆行性健忘症, 急性心理压抑.

sentences.en: He says his family saw this as a retrograde career move.
sentences.cn: 他表示,他的家人将这一步视为其职业生涯的退步.

sentences.en: Host - rock alteration is made up of retrograde and mineralized alteration.
sentences.cn: 围岩蚀变包括退化蚀变和矿化蚀变.

sentences.en: Infection can spread retrograde down a drain from the exterior.
sentences.cn: 感染能从外界经引流管逆行播散.

sentences.en: Last month, in January, you were hampered with Mercury retrograde.
sentences.cn: 上个月, 也就是一月份, 你因水星逆行而受阻.

sentences.en: Let's talk about Mercury first, because I just about to go retrograde.
sentences.cn: 我们先来磋议关于水星的, 由于我只是发明到水星将会逆行.

sentences.en: Mercury will retrograde from January 28 to February 17.
sentences.cn: 水星在1月28日至2月17日将会倒退.

sentences.en: Mercury, your ruler, will be retrograde April 18 to May 11.
sentences.cn: 水星, 你的守护星, 将会在18日到5月11日逆行.

sentences.en: Sometimes Mercury retrograde can have positive ramifications when you least expect them.
sentences.cn: 有时,出乎意料地,水星逆行也会有积极的作用.

sentences.en: The closure of the factories is seen as a retrograde step .
sentences.cn: 工厂的关闭被认为是一个退步。

sentences.en: The closure of the factory is a retrograde step .
sentences.cn: 工厂的关闭是一大退步。

sentences.en: The motion of the particle is retrograde.
The possibility of obstructive uropathy was completely excluded by retrograde pyelography.
sentences.cn: 逆行性肾盂摄影检查完全排除阻塞性肾病变的可能性.

sentences.en: The rotation in the elliptic is retrograde.
sentences.cn: 在椭圆内的运动属于逆进型.

sentences.en: There was no bile reflux gastritis , retrograde infection, anastomosic ulcer, dumping syndrome.
sentences.cn: 全组无胆汁反流性胃炎 、 吻合口溃疡 、 行性感染和倾倒综合征发生.

words.tran_cn: 倒退的；[生物]退化的；次序颠倒的

trans.tran_cn: 向后的，退化的，恶化的，次序颠倒的
trans.tran_en: involving a return to an earlier and worse situation
